statements.statementText: Healthcare should be provided by the government as a universal right for all citizens
Private health insurance companies should compete in an open market without government intervention
Prescription drug prices should be regulated by the federal government
Employers should be required to provide health insurance to full-time employees
Mental health services should receive the same insurance coverage as physical health services
Public schools should receive increased federal funding to improve educational outcomes
Parents should be able to use public funds to send children to private or charter schools
College tuition at public universities should be free for all students
Teachers should be paid based on performance metrics and student outcomes
Student loan debt should be forgiven for borrowers earning below the median income
The federal minimum wage should be significantly increased from current levels
Reducing regulations on businesses creates more jobs and economic growth
Large corporations should pay a higher tax rate than small businesses
Workers should have the right to form and join labor unions without employer interference
Government should provide job training programs for workers displaced by automation
The government should take aggressive action to combat climate change even if it increases energy costs
Environmental regulations should be reduced to allow for more economic development
The country should transition to 100% renewable energy sources within the next two decades
Carbon emissions should be taxed to discourage pollution and fund clean energy research
Electric vehicle purchases should be subsidized by the government to accelerate adoption
Immigration levels should be reduced to protect jobs for current citizens
There should be a clear pathway to citizenship for undocumented immigrants already living in the country
Border security funding should be significantly increased to prevent illegal crossings
Employers who hire undocumented workers should face serious legal penalties
Refugees fleeing violence and persecution should be welcomed and given legal protection
Police departments should receive more funding to improve public safety
The criminal justice system should focus more on rehabilitation than punishment
Cash bail should be eliminated as it discriminates against low-income defendants
Mandatory minimum sentences should be eliminated to give judges more discretion
Non-violent drug offenders should receive treatment instead of prison sentences
Taxes on wealthy individuals should be significantly increased to fund public services
Tax cuts for businesses lead to economic growth that benefits everyone
The federal government should prioritize reducing the national debt over new spending programs
Capital gains should be taxed at the same rate as regular income
Social Security benefits should be expanded even if it requires higher payroll taxes
The government should build more public housing to address homelessness and affordability
Zoning regulations should be reduced to allow more housing construction
Rent control policies should be implemented to protect tenants from excessive increases
First-time homebuyers should receive government assistance for down payments
Foreign investors should be restricted from purchasing residential property
The right to own firearms should be protected with minimal government restrictions
Stricter gun control laws are necessary to reduce gun violence
Universal background checks should be required for all gun purchases
Assault-style weapons should be banned from civilian ownership
Red flag laws allowing temporary removal of firearms from at-risk individuals should be enacted
Abortion should be legal and accessible without government restrictions
Marriage should be defined as between one man and one woman
Transgender individuals should be able to use bathrooms matching their gender identity
Affirmative action policies in college admissions should continue to promote diversity
Social media companies should be regulated to prevent spread of misinformation
